resources.string: (Required for Receiver) This is needed for the notifications to be shown on the receiver side.
(Required for Sender) This is needed so that the app receives phone events (Call events, Low battery etc.)
(Required for Sender) This is needed so that the number of the caller is included in the call event.
(Optional for Sender) This is needed so that the name of the contact is included in the payload that the sender sends.
